intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Passionate about building innovative solutions, crafting clean code, and turning ideas into impactful projects.

Cavite State University - Imus Campus.description: Bachelor Of Science in Information Technology - Magna Cum Laude

Figma.description: Proficient in prototyping and designing user-friendly interfaces with Figma, focusing on usability and aesthetics.

Web Development.description: Experienced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and design frameworks to create responsive, interactive, and visually appealing websites.

Nextjs.description: Proficient in using Next.js to build modern, efficient, and scalable web applications with features like server-side rendering and static site generation.

Canva.description: Creating professional-grade graphics and visuals effortlessly using Canva.

Adobe Photoshop.description: Skilled in Adobe Photoshop for advanced image editing, manipulation, and designing visual assets.

Object-Oriented Programming (Java).description: Experienced in OOP concepts and proficient in Java for building scalable and maintainable applications.

Spring Boot API Development.description: Capable of creating robust and efficient APIs using Spring Boot for seamless backend integration.

Deployment and Build Management.description: Skilled in deployment processes, managing build pipelines, and resolving deployment challenges to ensure smooth application delivery.

Git.description: Experienced in using Git for version control, focusing on collaboration through branching, merging, and resolving conflicts, and managing forks for efficient teamwork and code contributions.
